title: Barbecued steak with blue cheese, garlic and herb butter
ingredients: ['120g butter, softened', '30g Gorgonzola or other blue cheese', '3 tablespoons fresh thyme, chopped', '2 tablespoons fresh rosemary, chopped', '2 tablespoons fresh parsley, chopped', '1 teaspoon dried crushed chilli flakes', '2 garlic cloves', '2 tablespoons pine nuts', 'Salt and freshly cracked black pepper to taste', '8 sirloin steaks (around 200g each)']
